attributes.action: Help Working mums During and after Furlough
attributes.additional_details:
Make it known to companies that women MUST be furloughed if they have childcare needs. 

This is 2021 and within the space of a year women have been made to feel like we have just returned to the 1940s
attributes.background: Women who have worked and juggled childcare are being abandoned during the Covid outbreak! cOmpanies are rejecting women’s rights to furlough. When we have a epidemic on our hands and schools are closed. Why are we suffering with extra stress and anxiety to keep a roof over our our heads.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about the impact of the Covid-19 outbreak on parents, but it's not clear exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign: 

Pay parents that have to take time off due to school covid closures: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559231
                
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
